abstract: "Grafika: 30 Artists of Young Spain," an exhibition of urban art by artists born in the 1970s and '80s, runs from Oct. 7 to Jan. 15 at the Instituto Cervantes in Madrid.
snippet: "Grafika: 30 Artists of Young Spain," an exhibition of urban art by artists born in the 1970s and '80s, runs from Oct. 7 to Jan. 15 at the Instituto Cervantes in Madrid.

headline.main: Young Artists the Focus at Madrid Show
